name: FNF - Vs. Ayana Demo
description:
If fighting your ex in week 3 wasn't enough to deter you, Daddy Dearest hires another one for week 4! This time, instead of putting a hit out for you, someone is back to hit on you. Your ex Ayana from college is hired on to win your heart over. She still hasn't gotten over the break up and she's determined to split you two apart so she can have you for herself again! Show Ayana that you're over her and prove to your girlfriend that your heart won't sway for anyone else!

New song  - Something Spiteful- is over Satin-Panties! All three difficulties are available.

...yes, BF is the one that broke things off.
No, that's not the mom in the back, that's Daddy Dearest's henchwomen
